stories.body:
Federal Firefighters Face Steep Pay Cuts  大火頻發反遭大減薪 美聯邦 消防員 火大
 Thousands of federal firefighters could face substantial pay cuts in the coming weeks, potentially hampering the country's ability to respond to wildfires as they have grown more severe.
  成千上萬 美國 聯邦消防員未來幾周內恐面臨大幅減薪，在美國野火災害惡化之際，恐進一步阻礙美國因應火災的能力。
  Federal wildland firefighters received a temporary boost to their paychecks last year, which was meant to help strained agencies offer more competitive wages to recruit and retain workers. But funding for the pay raises is set to run dry next month, and federal officials have warned that more firefighters will leave for higher-paying jobs if their salaries are slashed.
  聯邦荒野消防員去年獲得暫時性加薪，這是為了協助人力吃緊的聯邦消防單位開出更具競爭力的薪資，留住消防員並招募新血。但用來加薪的資金預計下個月就會用罄，而聯邦官員已警告，如果 薪水 削減，將導致更多消防員離職，尋求薪水更優渥的工作。
  In 2021, President Joe Biden raised the minimum wage for wildland firefighters to $15 an hour from $13. Congress then agreed to increase firefighter pay by either 50% of a worker's base salary or $20,000 a year, whichever was lower.
  2021年，美國總統拜登提高荒野消防員的最低薪資，時薪從13美元提高到15美元，國會後來同意提高消防員底薪50%，抑或每年加薪2萬美元，以較低者為準。
  The typical base salary for an entry-level wildland firefighter is about $34,000 without the supplement, according to Agriculture Department data.
  根據美國農業部資料，不計上述加薪的情況下，新進荒野消防員的標準底薪約3萬4000美元。
  The temporary supplement was intended to serve as a “bridge for two years as the administration works with Congress on longer-term reforms,” according to a White House statement. While there is some bipartisan support for a permanent pay raise, it is unclear whether Congress will approve an increase.
  根據白宮聲明，暫時性加薪旨在作為「政府與國會攜手進行長期改革的為期兩年的過渡方案」。雖然一項永久加薪法案獲得某些跨黨派支持，但仍不確定國會是否會批准加薪。
  Republicans are pushing for deep spending cuts, and disagreements over funding levels nearly led to a government shutdown late last month. The removal of Rep. Kevin McCarthy as House speaker has also thrown that chamber into disarray, raising the chances of a shutdown next month.
  共和黨人正推動大幅削減開支，而資金水平的分歧上月底差點導致政府關門。眾議院議長麥卡錫遭罷黜也讓眾院陷入混亂，提高下個月政府關門風險。
  The pay cuts are looming at a moment when climate change has intensified the risk of wildfires, which have grown larger, spread faster and become more destructive in recent years. Warmer temperatures and drier conditions have also led to longer fire seasons, increasing the burden on federal firefighters who respond to both fires on federal land and assist state and local fire departments.
  減薪問題籠罩之際，氣候變遷加劇野火災害風險，近年的野火規模更大、蔓延更快速並且更具有毀滅性。氣溫升高、環境變乾也導致野火季的時間拉長，加重聯邦消防員負擔，他們除了負責應對聯邦土地上的野火，還得支援各州與地方的消防單位。
  The federal government has long struggled to hire firefighters, largely because wages have lagged behind some state and local counterparts. Many workers could also earn more money at less strenuous jobs.
  聯邦政府長期以來難以招募消防員，主要是因為薪水不如某些州及地方消防單位。許多工人從事較不辛苦的工作還能賺更多。
  The National Federation of Federal Employees, which represents about 10,000 wildland firefighters, has estimated that 30% to 50% of the workforce could resign if salary increases end.
  代表大約1萬名荒野消防員的美國聯邦雇員全國聯合會預估，加薪一旦中止恐將會導致30%至50%的人力辭職。
  文／Madeleine Ngo 譯／陳曉慈
  說文解字看新聞
  【陳曉慈】
  美國近年來野火頻發，正需打火兄弟賣命的關鍵時刻，卻發生減薪的狀況，令人費解。標題的steep用作形容詞時，可指陡峭或劇烈變化(steep cuts in benefits)，也有價格貴到離譜之意(steep rents)。用作動詞時指浸透、沉浸，be steeped in history/tradition/politics指有濃厚的特定氣息：This city leaves a lasting legacy steeped in military history.
  Throw something into disarray/fall into disarray都指陷入混亂狀態：Now that global capitalism is in disarray, it would make sense to support local businesses.
  形容詞strenuous指繁重、艱苦之意。E. M. Forster的小說Howards End曾被改編為電影《此情可問天 》，有一段這樣描述書中人Tibby Schlegel：His was the leisure without sympathy--an attitude as fatal as the strenuous: a little cold culture may be raised on it, but no art.
  ▪ 【專題】數位原生世代大揭密 青少年邊玩邊學的網路世界
  ▪ 【專訪】從小「超愛講話」斜槓學生兼網紅 她如何做到14歲YT就有8.6萬訂閱？
  ▪ 【專訪】親子3C衝突一招化解 媽媽「不窺探」的溫柔：社群就是孩子另一張臉
  ▪ 【專訪】青少年社群成癮逼瘋爸媽？心理師的殘酷領悟：快50歲感覺快被淘汰
  ▪ 【專訪】高三生YTR企劃拍片剪輯一手包！父母默默關注、大方贊助設備
  ▪ 【專訪】社群如雙面刃有好事有壞事 高三生愛用Study With Me讀書變自律！
  ▪ 「數位原生世代」學習神器調查 直播「讀書」竟有百萬人搶看？
  ▪ 【街訪】封鎖爸媽的原因竟是...青少年都在用的APP你聽過幾個？
  ▪ 【街訪】學霸都下載什麼App？ 直擊Z世代數位學習工具
  相關新聞
  商品推薦
  FB留言
  udn討論區
  共 則留言

stories.body:
Compartimos tutorial de la herramienta HeyGen que te permite crear un avatar con inteligencia artificial y generar un video de 1 minuto gratis.
 ¿Te gustaría tener un con personalizado que diga lo que quieras con tu propia voz ? Con , una plataforma de fácil uso, puedes crear uno gratis a tu imagen y semejanza, en solo unos minutos.
  En esta nota te explicamos cómo hacerlo paso a paso, además está insertado un video tutorial más preciso que realizó el director de , Antonio Manco.
  Antes debes saber que HeyGen es una plataforma que te permite crear avatares realistas con inteligencia artificial. Puedes usarlos para comunicarte con tu audiencia, crear contenido original o simplemente divertirte. Lo mejor de todo es que puedes hacerlo gratis y sin necesidad de tener conocimientos técnicos.
  Para crear tu avatar con inteligencia artificial solo necesitas lo siguiente:
  Un video de dos minutos con buen audio e iluminación, donde hables sobre el tema que quieras. Puedes grabarlo con tu celular o con tu webcam.
  Una cuenta de Gmail para registrarte en HeyGen.
  Un micrófono y una cámara web para verificar tu identidad.
  Puedes subtitularlo o insertar tu logo con otras herramientas como CapCut.
  @antoniomancoperu
  ¡El tutorial que esperabas! CREA tu avatar con inteligencia artificial ( IA ) a tu imagen y semejanza, capaz de reproducir tus palabras y hechizar a tus espectadores. #tutorial #InteligenciaArtificial #Avatar #HeyGen #AntonioManco #Parati #Foryou #tiktoknoticias con @En Línea más videos @Antonio Manco
  ♬ Halloween ・ cute horror song – PeriTune
  Una vez que tengas todo listo, sigue estos pasos:
  1- Ingresa a [ ] y crea una cuenta con tu Gmail. Valida tu correo electrónico y mira el video del CEO de la app, donde te explica los beneficios de usar HeyGen.
  Haz clic en “Get Started” y selecciona los campos que te interesan, como el idioma, el género, la edad y el estilo de tu avatar.
  2- Haz clic en “Free Instant Avatar” y luego en “Get Started” de nuevo. Verás unas instrucciones con un video, donde te explican cómo grabar tu video de dos minutos.
  3- Sigue las recomendaciones y sube el video que grabaste o grábalo directamente con la webcam. Asegúrate de marcar los cuatro checks que aparecen debajo del video.
  4- Espera unos minutos mientras HeyGen procesa tu video y crea tu avatar. Verás una barra de progreso que indica el porcentaje completado.
  5- Cuando tu avatar esté al 100%, activa tu micrófono y tu cámara web y repite el texto de comprobación que te dará HeyGen usando “Español”. Esto es para verificar que eres tú quien creó el avatar y evitar suplantaciones de identidad.
  6- ¡Listo! Ya tienes tu avatar creado con inteligencia artificial. Ahora puedes escribir en la línea de tiempo el texto que quieras que diga tu avatar y ver cómo lo pronuncia con tu propia voz.
  Recuerda que puedes crear hasta un minuto de videos gratis con tu avatar o pagar 24 dólares al mes para tener acceso ilimitado.
  También puedes descargar los videos que crees, subtitularlos con CapCut, ponerles tu logo y subirlos a tus redes sociales . Recuerda usar HeyGen con responsabilidad y respeto.
  Si te gustó este tutorial, sígueme como antoniomanco en FB, TW, Instagram y Treads y como antoniomancoperu en Twitter. Te espero con más consejos sobre tecnología e inteligencia artificial.
  ¡Descubre el Futuro de la Creación de Contenido con Heygen AI!
  Heygen AI es la puerta de entrada a un mundo de innovación en la generación de videos. Esta plataforma en línea utiliza tecnologías de vanguardia, como machine learning, procesamiento de lenguaje natural y animación 3D, para transformar tus palabras en videos de alta calidad de forma automática. Pero eso no es todo, ¡aquí te contamos sus características clave que te dejarán boquiabierto!
  Avatares Personalizables:
  Heygen AI pone a tu disposición una increíble biblioteca de más de 100 avatares 3D altamente realistas que representan una amplia diversidad étnica, edades, estilos de vestimenta y mucho más. Y si buscas una experiencia única, ¡puedes crear tu propio avatar personalizado y ajustar hasta el más mínimo detalle!
  Voces AI:
  ¿Imaginas poder elegir entre más de 300 voces sintetizadas de vanguardia en 40 idiomas? Heygen AI lo hace posible. Además, si deseas una voz completamente personalizada para tu avatar, también puedes solicitarla. ¡Tus videos nunca sonarán igual!
  Generación Rápida de Videos:
  Con Heygen AI, la creación de videos es pan comido. Basta con escribir el guión, seleccionar tus recursos visuales y dejar que la IA haga el resto. En cuestión de minutos, tendrás videos de alta calidad listos para compartir con el mundo. ¡La eficiencia en su máxima expresión!
  Plantillas e Integraciones:
  Heygen AI simplifica aún más tu flujo de trabajo con su amplia colección de plantillas pre-diseñadas para diversos usos. Además, se integra perfectamente con herramientas populares como Zapier, ChatGPT, Canva, entre otras. Todo está diseñado para que tu experiencia sea aún más productiva y creativa.

stories.title: Crea tu avatar con inteligencia artificial (IA) igual a ti e impresiona a tu audiencia en redes sociales

en.body:
We share a tutorial from the HeyGen tool that allows you to create an artificial intelligence avatar and generate a free 1 minute video.
Would you like to have a personalized one to say what you want with your own voice ? With , a platform of easy use, you can create a free image and a similar one in just a few minutes.
In this note we explain how to do it step by step, and a more accurate tutorial video is inserted that the director of , Antonio Manco, has done.
You should know that HeyGen is a platform that allows you to create realistic amateurs with artificial intelligence. You can use them to communicate with your audience, create original content or just enjoy yourself. The best thing is that you can do it free and without having to have technical knowledge.
To create your avatar with artificial intelligence you only need the following:
A two-minute video with good audio and lighting, where you talk about the subject you want. You can record it with your cell phone or with your webcam.
A Gmail account to register with HeyGen.
A microphone and a web camera to check your identity.
You can sub-type it or insert your logo with other tools like CapCut.
@antoniomancoperu
The tutorial you were expecting! CREA your avatar with artificial intelligence ( IA ) to your image and similarity, capable of playing your words and hackling your viewers. #tutorial #IntelligenceArtic #Avatar #HeyGen #AntonioManco #Parati #Foryou #ktoknotices with @In Linea more videos @Antonio Manco
"Halloween — 'Cat horror song - PeriTune
Once you're ready, follow these steps:
1- Enter a [ ] and create an account with your Gmail. Validate your email and look at the video of the app CEO, where you can explain the benefits of using HeyGen.
Click on “Get Started” and select the fields that interest you, such as language, gender, age and style of your avatar.
2- Click on “Free Instant Avatar” and then on “Get Started” again. You will see instructions with a video, where they explain how to record your two-minute video.
3- Follow the recommendations and upload the video you recorded or burn directly with the webcam. Make sure to mark the four checks that appear below the video.
4- Wait a few minutes while HeyGen process your video and create your avatar. You will see a progress bar indicating the complete percentage.
5- When your avatar is 100%, activate your microphone and your web camera and repeat the check text that HeyGen will give you using "Spanish". This is to check that you are the one who created the avatar and avoid identity replacements.
6- That's it! You already have your avatar created with artificial intelligence. Now you can write in the time line the text you want to say your avatar and see how you pronounce it with your own voice.
Remember that you can create up to a minute of free videos with your avatar or pay $24 a month to have unlimited access.
You can also download the videos you believe, subtitle them with CapCut, put your logo and upload them to your social networks . Remember to use HeyGen with responsibility and respect.
If you like this tutorial, you can sit down as an antoniomanco on RB, TW, Instagram and Treads and as antoniomancoperu on Twitter. I'm waiting for you with more advice on technology and artificial intelligence.
Hide the Future of Content Creation with Heygen AI!
Heygen AI is the gateway to an innovation world in the generation of videos. This online platform uses advanced technologies such as machine learning, natural language processing and 3D animation, to automatically convert your words into high-quality videos. But that's not all, here we tell you their key features that will leave you in the dark!
Personalised Avatars:
Heygen AI makes available an incredible library of over 100 highly realistic 3D amateurs representing a wide ethnic diversity, ages, styles of clothing and much more. And if you are looking for a unique experience, you can create your own customised avatar and adjust to the minimum detail!
AI Voices:
Can you choose between more than 300 pre-frontalized voices in 40 languages? Hey, AI makes it possible. In addition, if you want a completely customised voice to your avatar, you can also request it. Your videos will never sound the same!
Rapid Video Generation:
With Heygen AI, the creation of videos is eaten bread. You can only write the guide, select your visual resources and let the IA do the rest. In a matter of minutes, you will have high quality videos ready to share with the world. The efficiency in his maximum expression!
Plants and integrations:
Heygen AI further simplifies your workflow with its wide collection of pre-designed templates for various uses. It is also perfectly integrated with popular tools such as Zapier, ChatGPT, Canva, among others. Everything is designed to make your experience even more productive and creative.

stories.body:
当顶部P-MOSFET开关关闭时，底部同步N-MOSFET开关被打开。一旦电感器电流反转，顶部和底部的MOSFET都将被关闭，以使SW引脚进入高阻抗状态。  FP8013的电流模式控制回路还包括斜坡补偿，以抑制高占空比下的次谐波振荡。这种斜坡补偿是通过在电感器电流信号中添加一个补偿斜坡来实现的。
 二、FP8013 LDO模式
  FP8013的最大占空比可达到100%。这意味着司机的主开关在整个时钟周期中一直打开。一旦占空比达到100%，反馈路径就不再控制输出电压。输出电压将是输入电压减去主开关的电压降。
  在开关模式下，输入电流在降压转换器中是不连续的。高侧MOSFET的源电流波形为方波。为了防止较大的电压瞬变，必须使用一个具有最大RMS电流大小的低ESR输入电容器。输入电容电流的均方根值可通过以下计算：
  可以看出，当VO为VIN的一半时，CIN处于当前最糟糕的压力下。CIN目前最大的压力是IO_MAX/2。
  电感值可通过以下方法计算：
  电感器纹波电流的计算方法为：
  电感电流为：
  三、PC板布局检查
  由GND、SW和VIN轨迹组成的功率轨迹应保持短、直接和宽。
  将CIN放置在VIN引脚附近，以保持输入电压稳定，并过滤掉脉冲输入电流。
  电流设置电阻器R1必须直接且尽可能紧密地连接到FB引脚上。
  FB是一个敏感的节点。请远离切换节点。一个好的方法是在另一个PCB层上路由反馈跟踪，并在顶部和反馈跟踪路由层之间有一个地平面。这减少了电磁干扰辐射到DC-DC转换器，其自身的电压反馈轨迹。
  保持CIN和COUT的GND板尽可能接近。然后将其连接到地平面（如果使用的话）。这通过防止开关电流通过地平面循环来降低地平面噪声。它还通过提供FP8013的低阻抗接地连接，减少了FP8013的接地反弹。
  SOP-8L（EP）建议布置图：
  以上就是 DC-DC内置MOS降压恒流IC——FP8013开关稳压器 的部分内容分享，还有部分资料可翻看我的前面分享。
  深圳市雅欣控制技术有限公司，在芯片行业深耕二十载。是Feeling和MST在深圳的一级代理商。致力于推广销售电源管理芯片、LED驱动芯片和霍尔开关系列产品，小雅为您提供最优化的解决方案、最优质的产品及咨询服务。

sentences: When the P-MOSFET switch is closed, the bottom sync N-MOSFET switch is opened.
To prevent large voltage sudden change, a low ESR input capacitor with maximum RMS current size must be used.
Place the CIN near the VIN to keep the input voltage stable and filter out the pulse input current.
This reduces surface noise by preventing switch currents from circulating through the surface.
In the switch mode, the input current is not continuous in the decompressor.

stories.title: DC-DC内置MOS降压恒流IC——FP8013开关稳压器，便携式照明

en.body:
When the P-MOSFET switch is closed, the bottom sync N-MOSFET switch is opened. Once the current of the sensor is reversed, the top and bottom MOSFET will be closed to allow SW to move to high resistance. The FP8013 mode control circuit also includes slope compensation to inhibit the high-voltage oscillation below. This slope compensation is achieved by adding a compensation slope to the current signal of the sensor.
II. FP8013 LDO
The largest vacancy rate for FP8013 is 100%. This means that the driver's main switch has been open throughout the clock cycle. Once the gap is 100%, the feedback path no longer controls the output voltage. The output voltage will be the voltage drop of the main switch.
In the switch mode, the input current is not continuous in the decompressor. The source current wave of high-end MOSFET is square. To prevent large voltage sudden change, a low ESR input capacitor with maximum RMS current size must be used. The capacitor currents can be calculated by the following:
It can be seen that when VO is half of the VIN, the CIN is under the worst pressure at the moment. The biggest pressure at the moment is IO_MAX/2.
The electric value can be calculated by the following method:
The method of calculating the current of the voltage is:
The current of the current is:
III. PC board layout check
The power tracks consisting of GND, SW and VIN tracks should be kept short, direct and wide.
Place the CIN near the VIN to keep the input voltage stable and filter out the pulse input current.
The current setting resistor R1 must be connected directly and as closely as possible to the FB's foot.
FB is a sensitive node. Please move away from the switch node. One good way is to track feedback on another PCB layer, and there is a surface between the top and feedback tracking paths. This reduces the radiation of electromagnetic interference to the DC-DC converter, its own voltage feedback track.
Keep the GND board as close as possible to the CIN and COUT. Then connect it to the surface (if used). This reduces surface noise by preventing switch currents from circulating through the surface. It also reduces the FP8013's ground-back by providing low-blocked connection to the FP8013.
SOP-8L (EP) recommended layout:
Here's a partial share of the DC-DC internalization of the MOS constant flow I-FP8013 switch-pump, and some of the data can be viewed in front of me.

We are committed to promoting sales power management chips, LED drive chips and Hull-up products, and provide you with optimal solutions, best quality products and consulting services.
en.title: DC-DC In-house MOS Depression constant flow IC - FP8013 switch-steel, portable lighting

stories.body:
Os processos foram abertos na CVM após o episódio conhecido como “Joesley Day”. Em 17 de maio de 2017, o colunista Lauro Jardim, do jornal O Globo, noticiou que Joesley Batista havia delatado o então presidente Michel Temer. O vazamento do conteúdo da conversa entre os dois mostrou indícios de corrupção e estabeleceu uma crise no país.

No dia seguinte, 18 de maio de 2017, ficou registrado como a maior queda do Ibovespa em nove anos e a maior alta do dólar em 14 anos. A acusação apontava que os acusados agiram no mercado sabendo dos efeitos que a notícia sobre o acordo de colaboração premiada causaria — e tiveram vantagens com as operações realizadas.

Um dos processos concluído nesta terça-feira analisou a conduta dos irmãos Joesley e Wesley Batista e da J&F Participações, holding do grupo, em acusações que envolviam práticas de “insider” (uso de informação privilegiada), manipulação de preço, abuso de poder de controle e quebra de dever de lealdade.

Em maio, o diretor Otto Lobo, relator do caso, sugeriu que houve apenas uma infração no caso e votou por multar a J&F em R$ 500 mil por ter negociado ações da JBS de posse de informação privilegiada, caracterizando a quebra do dever de lealdade do controlador. E votou pela absolvição das outras acusações. O presidente da CVM, João Pedro Nascimento, e os diretores João Accioly e Alexandre Rangel manifestaram, à época, seus votos pela absolvição de todas as acusações.

Hoje, a diretora Flávia Perlingeiro, votou pela condenação dos acusados. Ela concordou com os argumentos da área técnica responsável pela acusação e votou, inclusive pela inabilitação temporária dos Batista por sete anos, mas foi voto vencido. Portanto, manteve-se a absolvição por maioria, que já havia sido formada em maio.

Procurada, a J&F Investimentos disse em nota que “a decisão desfaz uma injustiça e reafirma a integridade das operações dos executivos e empresas do grupo J&F no mercado financeiro”.

Os outros dois casos julgados nesta terça-feira envolviam o uso de práticas não equitativas com derivativos de câmbio e de juros futuros. No início do julgamento, o relator Lobo havia votado pela absolvição, e acompanhado pelos outros diretores e pelo presidente. A diretora Perlingeiro votou pela absolvição no caso dos derivativos de juros, e pela condenação no processo de derivativos de câmbio, mas também foi voto vencido.

Houve apenas uma condenação, definida em maio, da J&F Investimentos (sucessora da FB Participações). A empresa foi multada em R$ 500 mil, por ter negociado ações da JBS em período vedado por força do programa de recompra.

sentences: Os processos foram abertos na CVM após o episódio conhecido como “Joesley Day”.

Um dos processos concluído nesta terça-feira analisou a conduta dos irmãos Joesley e Wesley Batista e da J&F Participações, holding do grupo, em acusações que envolviam práticas de “insider” (uso de informação privilegiada), manipulação de preço, abuso de poder de controle e quebra de dever de lealdade.

Em maio, o diretor Otto Lobo, relator do caso, sugeriu que houve apenas uma infração no caso e votou por multar a J&F em R$ 500 mil por ter negociado ações da JBS de posse de informação privilegiada, caracterizando a quebra do dever de lealdade do controlador.
A diretora Perlingeiro votou pela absolvição no caso dos derivativos de juros, e pela condenação no processo de derivativos de câmbio, mas também foi voto vencido.
O presidente da CVM, João Pedro Nascimento, e os diretores João Accioly e Alexandre Rangel manifestaram, à época, seus votos pela absolvição de todas as acusações.

stories.title: CVM conclui julgamento e confirma absolvição dos irmãos Batista, da JBS

en.body:
The proceedings were opened at the CVM after the episode known as "Joesley Day". On May 17, 2017, columnist Lauro Jardim of the newspaper O Globe reported that Joesley Batista had resigned then-President Michel Temer. The breakdown of the content of the conversation between the two showed signs of corruption and established a crisis in the country.

The following day, May 18, 2017, it was recorded as the largest drop of Ibovespa in nine years and the highest dollar in 14 years. The charge stated that the accused acted on the market knowing the effects that the news on the awarded cooperation agreement would cause — and had advantages with the operations carried out.

One of the trials concluded on Tuesday examined the conduct of the brothers Joesley and Wesley Batista and J&F Participations, holding the group in accusations involving “insistent” (privatising information), price manipulation, abuse of control and 2008.

In May, director Otto Lobo, the rapporteur of the case, suggested that there was only one infringement in the case and voted to punish J&F at R$500,000 for negotiating JBS actions with privileged information, characterised by the breakdown of the And he voted for the other charges to be dropped. The president of the CVM, John Pedro Nasción, and the directors John Accióly and Alexandre Rangel expressed their votes at the time for the elimination of all charges.

Today, the head of the Perlingiro Flávia Perlingiro voted for the condemnation of the accused. She agreed with the arguments in the technical area responsible for the charge and voted, including the temporary incapacity of the Batistas for seven years, but was voted. So the majority opt-out was maintained, which had already been formed in May.

In the search, J&F Investments said in a note that “the decision is unfair and reaffirms the integrity of J&F group operations in the financial market”.

The other two cases that were judged on Tuesday involved the use of unfair practices with future exchange and interest derivatives. At the beginning of the trial, the rapporteur, Mr Lobo, had voted for the abolition, accompanied by the other directors and the President. The Perlingiro director voted for the cancellation of interest-rate derivatives, and for the conviction in the exchange-rate derivatives process, but also the vote was won.

There was only one conviction, defined in May, of J&F Investments (later of the RB Participations). The company was fined R$500,000 for negotiating JBS shares during a period seen under the reward program.
en.title: CVM concludes trial and confirms the dissolution of the Batista brothers of JBS

stories.body:
McDonald's has released new Disney100 Happy Meal Toys as part of Disney's epic 100-year anniversary celebration.
 To mark Disney 's 100th anniversary, fast food chain McDonald's is offering a collection of Disney100 Happy Meal toys and adults are running to find the ‘super nostalgic' figurines.
  McDonald's release new Disney100 Happy Meal Toys
  On October 16, 2023, the Walt Disney Company celebrated its 100th anniversary
  As part of the celebrations to commemorate 10 decades of magical storytelling, Disney has teamed up with McDonald's to offer Happy Meal Toys.
  Each McDonald's Happy Meal includes two toys from the collection of 60 characters from Disney, Star Wars, Pixar, and Marvel, from Mickey and Minnie to Star from Disney's newest animated movie titled Wish.
  Children can also download coloring and activity sheets featuring Disney characters and play interactive games with their Disney100 Happy Meal toy on a phone or tablet.
  Each McDonald's Happy Meal has a choice of hamburger, four-piece Chicken McNuggets, or six-piece Chicken McNuggets with kids' fries or apples as a side, as well as a drink.
  McDonald's Disney100 Happy Meal toys are available at participating McDonald's for a limited time (while supplies last) – more details can be found on the official Happy Meal website page.
  First look Disney 100 McDonald's Happy Meal toys coming Oct 31 – Dec 4!
  (Reportedly in order of release from left to right starting with baby Groot/Vader) #Disney100 #McDonalds pic.twitter.com/IxuzEFELXT — MCU Portal (@MCU_Portal) October 30, 2023
  Five tips to get your hands on McDonald's Disney100 toys
  The collection of figurines will be available to collect from October 31 – December 4. So, you might want to be tactical about when you are going to treat yourself to a McDonald's meal if you are planning on building up the collection of Disney 100 toys.
  A fan shared some advice on Twitter, suggesting that the toys come in waves: “Each location will get random boxes of them and have to sell all in the boxes before the next ones come.”
  This means that only six different characters may be available per McDonald's restaurant.
  For those looking to get the Disney 100 McDonalds toys starting Oct 31st, please note these toys come in WAVES. Each location will get random boxes of them and HAVE to sell all in the boxes before the next ones come. So you may only have 6 different ones per McDs, HEADS UP ??? — ? Spooky Scary SkeleSkye ? (@SkyeFall88) October 26, 2023
  Two Disney figurines come in each Happy Meal box.
  TikTok creator and Disney fan @Discupcakes will be sharing the number of each box and the corresponding character – either on her TikTok page or over on Instagram.
  McDonald's staff won't be able to open the boxes and help customers know which characters are inside.
  However, the way you can check to try and collect all characters is by asking the staff to check the bottom of the boxes.
  Box number 1 is Elsa and Groot – they come as a pair.
  Box number 3 is Sully and Minnie.
  (Reportedly in order of release from left to right starting with baby Groot/Vader)
  According to TikToker @thesouthernsnack, a confidential employee sheet exists for McDonald's workers that shows the pairings in order.
  So, if you can find someone who works at McDonald's and has access to the allegedly confidential sheet then you have a chance of knowing which boxes to get your hands on in order to complete your collection.
  Five tips to get your hands on McDonald's new Disney100 Happy Meal Toys
  Check out the full collection of the figurines, shared on social media:
  Disney 100 Happy Meals are coming! Launching 10/31 ~ until 12/4 ~ here's a look at the full selection! Thanks FB Ben S ~ #FPN #FunkoPOPNews #McDonalds #HappyMeal #Disney100 #Disney pic.twitter.com/ZXKHXRwmuk — Funko POP News ! (@FunkoPOPsNews) October 26, 2023
  Related Topics

stories.body:
Fenerbahçe Teknik Direktörü İsmail Kartal, Pendikspor karşılaşmasının ardından yaptığı açıklamalar sebebiyle Profesyonel Futbol Disiplin Kurulu'na (PFDK) sevk edildi.
TFF, Fenerbahçe Teknik Direktörü İsmail Kartal'ın hakem ve diğer müsabaka görevlileri hakkındaki açıklamaları sebebiyle PFDK'ye sevk edildiğini açıkladı.
 TFF'den yapılan açıklama şu şekilde: "FENERBAHÇE A.Ş. Kulübü teknik sorumlusu İSMAİL KARTAL’ın 29.10.2023 tarihinde oynanan SİLTAŞ YAPI PENDİKSPOR FUTBOL A.Ş.-FENERBAHÇE A.Ş. Trendyol Süper Lig müsabakası sonrası flaş röportajda ve basın toplantısında yapmış olduğu açıklamalarında yer alan “hakem ve diğer müsabaka görevlileri hakkında açıklamalar” nedeniyle Futbol Disiplin Talimatı’nın 38. maddesi uyarınca tedbirsiz olarak PFDK'ya sevkine karar verilmiştir."
 İSMAİL KARTAL NE DEMİŞTİ? İsmail Kartal, Pendikspor maçının ardından penaltı pozisyonuna tepki göstererek, "Bugüne kadar oynadığımız bütün maçları hak ederek kazandık. Başkalarının nasıl kazandığına bakmıyorum. Bundan sonra da kendi işimizi en iyi şekilde yaparak devam edeceğiz. Ancak şunu söylemem gerekiyor, bugünkü penaltı pozisyonu hakemin net önündeydi. Penaltı verilmesi için daha ne yapılması lazım bilmiyorum. Maçın 5-0 olması önemli değil. Burada penaltının verilip verilmemesi önemliydi. Maç 0-0 olsa ne olacaktı. Hakemlerin bu anlamda herkese eşit olmasını istiyoruz" ifadelerini kullanmıştı.
 Paylaş

"We have won by winning all the matches we have played so far," Ismail Kartal responded to the penalty position after the Pendikspor match.
The TFF statement read: "FENERBAHCHE A.S.
But I must say, today's penalty position was clearly before the referee.

stories.title: FB Teknik Direktörü Kartal, PFDK'ye sevk edildi!

en.body:
Fenerbahce Technical Director Ismail Kartal was transferred to the Professional Football Discipline Board (PFDK) for his statements following the Pendiksport match.
The TFF said that it was transferred to the PFDK because of statements by Fenerbahce Tech Director Ismail Kartal about referees and other competitions.
The TFF statement read: "FENERBAHCHE A.S. The club was the FIBAN FUTTOL A.S.-FENERBAHCHES (1999.10.2023) of the KSMAIL KARTAL. After the tournament, the 38th edition of the Football Disciplinary Talima was due to "explanations of the players and other players", which he said in an interview and at a press conference after the Super League. It has been decided to transfer to the PFDK without any measure," he said.
WELL KER NEED? "We have won by winning all the matches we have played so far," Ismail Kartal responded to the penalty position after the Pendikspor match. I don't see how others win. And then we'll continue our work in the best way we can. But I must say, today's penalty position was clearly before the referee. I don't know what else to do to get a punishment. It doesn't matter if the game is 5-0. Whether the penalty was given was important. What would have happened if the match was 0-0. We want the judges to be equal to everyone in this sense," he used his statement.
Share
en.title: RB Technical Director Kartal was transferred to PFDK!

stories.body:
芝加哥大學針對美國人的社會觀點進行逾50年的「總體社會調查」(General Social Survey)顯示，1990年代中期，約三分之一的國人表示理想的家庭應該養育三名以上子女，之後抱持這一看法的受訪者比率逐漸攀升，儘管疫情後曾短暫下滑，但這一人群比率於2022年再度反彈至44%。
 與此同時，認為理想家庭應該養育兩個小孩的比率從1998年的62%跌至2022年的51.7%；平均上，理想家庭的子女數目為2.5個小孩，略高於1990年代。
  蓋洛普民調(Gallup)自1936年以來便調查這一問題，數據顯示當時的理想家庭規模更大，養育子女的理想數目為3.6個小孩，人們心中理想家庭規模近乎全體的轉變發生於1960年。
  約翰霍普金斯大學人口統計學者艾莉森·傑米爾(Alison Gemmill)指出，基本上，許多人只是認為「如果生活一切順利美滿，擁有大一點的家庭並不壞」。
  認為不生小孩最為理想的人則相當少見，德州大學研究員亞曼達·內格爾(Amanda Nagle)指出，抱持這種看法的絕大部分是認為氣候變遷「極度」危險的人群，且即使在這一人群中也很罕見。
  至於為何無法擁有理想中的家庭規模？這可能是無解的問題，許多千禧世代不急著成家，他們的優先任務可能是還清學貸或存錢買房，即便結了婚，也不一定急著要小孩，最終下定決心後可能還會遇到不孕的問題，各種因素均可能成為生育計畫的阻礙。
  相關新聞
  商品推薦
  FB留言
  udn討論區
  共 則留言

en.body:

stories.body:
Councilor Marissa and Ralph Abella. FB Photo The Sasa Police Station is currently investigating the death threat received by former Davao City Councilor Ralph Abella, who ran and lost for Barangay Captain in Barangay Vicente Hizon Sr. during the recently concluded Barangay and Sangguniang Kabataan Elections (BSKE) 2023.
Davao City Police Office (DCPO) spokesperson Capt. Hazel Tuazon said on Tuesday that DCPO is still awaiting the results of the investigation being conducted by Sasa Police Station.
 “Naa pa tay ongoing investigation ana kung election related ba gyud tung nahitabo sa iyaha pero so far naghulat pa ta sa result sa investigation nga gibuhat sa Sasa Police Station,” she said over Davao City Disaster Radio (DCDR) on Tuesday.
 Councilor Marissa Abella of the Second District and chair of the Committee on Food and Agriculture of the City Council, said she opened a small package placed inside the red plastic bag, which was delivered by an unidentified person at their residence at Plaza Nova, Nova Tierra Subdivision in Brgy. Vicente Hizon, Davao City.
 Based on the report of the Sasa Police Station, the package contained three pieces of white flowers stained with blood and one unit of 9mm ammunition wrapped in a white bond paper with threatening statement “MAM MARISSA KUNG GUSTO MO SA INYONG MGA ANAK WALAY MAWALA NINYO INGNA IMUHA BANA RALPH UNDANGON NIYA PAGFILE KASO HA GUSTO MO ANG BUHAY KINABUHI NINYO IMPORTANTE” were written in bold letters.
 Police Brigadier General Alden Delvo, regional director of Police Regional Office 11 (PRO 11), on Monday said that he was going to see Abella personally to discuss the threat he received.
 “I will have to see him personally and interview him about the threat that he received. So, for now wala pa tayong official report coming from the hepe of the barangay where he is from and also I have to talk with the city director on the formal report of the threats gathered against former councilor,” Delvo said.
 Meanwhile, the DCPO reported that the holding of BSKE on Monday was generally peaceful and no untoward incidents reported from the 20 police stations in Davao City.
 “Sa Davao City peaceful and no recorded incidents from Police Station 1 to 20 so far ug nagpasalamat gyud ta ana. For the voting centers normal. Walay kasamok na panghitabo,” Tuazon said.
 Delvo also lauded all the security forces, other government agencies, local government units, stakeholders and the community for the collective effort, support and cooperation to make the BSKE 2023 successful.
 In a statement, Delvo reported that the BSKE 2023 in Davao Region was generally peaceful.
 “I laud all the security forces, other government agencies, local government units, stakeholders and the community for one colelctive effort, support, and cooperation to make the BSKE 2023 successful. Indeed, together we have protected our citizenry’s right to suffrage which is a basic tenet of our democracy,” he said.
 During the conduct of the elections, Delvo personally visited and inspected the polling precincts in Digos City and Matanao, Davao del Sur for having most number of Election Areas of Concern (EAC) in Davao Region and in Davao City to ensure that security measures are implemented towards a peaceful, safe and orderly election.
 He made sure to visit and inspect Daniel R Aguinaldo National High School (DRANHS) where Vice President Sara Duterte cast her vote. This is also the school where former president Rodrigo Duterte supposedly cast his vote, however, he chose not to vote this election.

surface_forms.text: Committee on Food and Agriculture of the City Council

sentences: Councilor Marissa and Ralph Abella.

“Naa pa tay ongoing investigation ana kung election related ba gyud tung nahitabo sa iyaha pero so far naghulat pa ta sa result sa investigation nga gibuhat sa Sasa Police Station,” she said over Davao City Disaster Radio (DCDR) on Tuesday.
The Sasa Police Station is currently investigating the death threat received by former Davao City Councilor Ralph Abella, who ran and lost for Barangay Captain in Barangay Vicente Hizon Sr.
Davao City Police Office (DCPO) spokesperson Capt. Hazel Tuazon said on Tuesday that DCPO is still awaiting the results of the investigation being conducted by Sasa Police Station.

During the conduct of the elections, Delvo personally visited and inspected the polling precincts in Digos City and Matanao, Davao del Sur for having most number of Election Areas of Concern (EAC) in Davao Region and in Davao City to ensure that security measures are implemented towards a peaceful, safe and orderly election.

stories.title: Cops investigate death threat vs ex-councilor

Rejoignez-nous pour une expérience d'Halloween palpitante comme aucune autre ! Préparez-vous à descendre dans les profondeurs de l'underground… Transformez
avec nous la nuit en une aventure remplie de rythmes hypnotiques et d'ambiances étranges…
  Il est à nouveau temps de vous déhancher sur les sons techno bien underground comme nous savons si bien faire ! Le son des ténèbres sera mixé par nos DJs locaux qui maintiendront la piste de danse en vie tout la nuit !
  Pour vous faire plaisir, nous convions à la fête PARFAIT !
  Elle vous entrainera à travers les basses qui résonnent dans votre âme…
  Vous n'allez quand même pas manquer ça ?
  Entrez dans les entrailles de Catacombe !
  Le Studio Saglio sera transformé en une catacombe hantée, remplie de mystère et d'envoûtement…

en.body:
Join us for a palpitant Halloween experience like no other! Be prepared to go down to the depths of the underground... Transform yourself.
With us tonight in an adventure filled with hip-hop rhythms and strange atmospheres...
It is time to get rid of the sound of the sound of the techno as well as we know it! The sound of the darkness will be mixed up by our local DJs who will keep the dance track alive all night!
To make you happy, we invite you to the PARFAIT party!
She'll enter you through the lows that resonate in your soul...
You're not going to miss it anyway?
Enter the entrances of Catacombe!
The Studio Saglio will be transformed into a snouted catacombe filled with mystery and snobs...

stories.body:
桃市陳姓男子透過交友App認識情竇初開的國一少女，聊天往來不滿半年就相約上旅店，雙方當晚才下床，就因故感情生變，陳男竟在數小時後，將兩人歡愛時的 愛情 動作片放上網路出售，數天後少女循線得知報警，桃園地院審結，將陳男依對於未滿14歲女子性交罪，又犯散布少年為性交行為電子訊號罪，分別判處1年6月，應執行徒刑2年。緩刑5年期間交付保護管束，上4場法治教育課。
 判決指出，陳姓男子2021年7、8月間高中畢業那年某日，透過交友軟體「探探」認識新北市剛上國中的少女，明知她是未滿14歲的女子，心智年齡還未成熟，兩人於去年1月26日晚間6點相約桃市楊梅區上旅店開房間，帶著少女偷嚐禁果，愛愛期間，陳男手持手機除拍攝少女裸露胸部照片，還將兩人歡愛的過程「全都錄」，總共拍了4部愛情動作片。
  詎料，兩人才滾完床單，各自回家前因故感情起糾紛，陳男於去年1月27日凌晨將他與少女的愛情動作片上傳推特，並附加「急用喔要買 影片 嗎」、「想不到吧要影片可買喔」等訊息及少女的IG頁面截圖供大眾瀏覽，還真有人花300、2000元購買他的愛情動作片，後經眾人閱覽陳男推特，循貼文聯絡上少女，經家長報警提告。
  檢警調查時，少女證稱她與陳男發生關係時，陳有拿著手機錄影，當時有詢問過她，雖不知陳為何要拍影片，但她是基於好玩的心態讓他拍等語，法官認定，陳男雖以利誘或慫恿、鼓勵少女拍攝愛情動作片，性行為部分觸犯對於未滿14歲女子為性交罪，拍攝與少女嘿咻行為觸犯兒童及少年性剝削防制條例的拍攝少年為性交行為的電子訊號罪。
  法官認為，被告雖坦承犯行，但僅因與少女間一時感情生變，便將與少女為性交行為電子訊號至公開網路平台販賣，甚至公開少女個人帳號，審酌被告行為時年齡僅18、19歲，因一時衝動觸法，無前科、素行尚佳，且於檢方偵查中已與少女的媽媽達成和解並給付40萬元賠償完畢，另為確保被告記取教訓，導正其偏差行為，杜絕再犯，諭知應接受4場次法治教育課程，藉教育過程深切反省行為是非對錯、強化行為管理能力，緩刑期內併付保護管束。

  udn討論區
